import React from 'react' import './login.css' import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; const LoginScreen = () => { const navigate = useNavigate() window.onload = function () { const registerButton = document.getElementById("register"); const loginButton = document.getElementById("login"); const container = document.getElementById("container"); registerButton.addEventListener("click", () => { container.classList.add("right-panel-active"); }); loginButton.addEventListener("click", () => { container.classList.remove("right-panel-active"); }); } return (

Start yout
journy now

if you don't have an account yet, join us and start your journey.

) } export default LoginScreen
